column4: 2019 at 15:05 pm The Teuk Thla Administration Police arrested two men for operating an illegal gambling site from a ground floor rental at the (Vennes?) Hotel
column8: Khan Sen Sok.------One of the detained men was named as Li Young
column10: 39 a Chinese chef living in the hotel. No drugs were found.------3 fish games
